text:
Need James Wilson for Myer campaign. Budget around $15,035, looking for 2 x Instagram reel, 2 x TikTok video, 3 x Instagram story. 8 week exclusivity from other fashion brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $15,035 budget

Need to confirm: deliverables
